verses.verse: Then Joseph<WH3130> could<WH3201> not refrain<WH662> himself before all them that stood<WH5324> by him; and he cried<WH7121>, Cause<WH3318> every man<WH376> to go out<WH3318> from me. And there stood<WH5975> no man<WH376> with him, while Joseph<WH3130> made himself known<WH3045> unto his brethren<WH251>.
And he wept<WH6963> <WH1065> aloud<WH5414>: and the Egyptians<WH4714> and the house<WH1004> of Pharaoh<WH6547> heard<WH8085> <WH8085>. wept: Heb. gave forth his voice in weeping

And Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559> unto his brethren<WH251>, I am Joseph<WH3130>; doth my father<WH1> yet live<WH2416>? And his brethren<WH251> could<WH3201> not answer<WH6030> him; for they were troubled<WH926> at his presence<WH6440>. troubled: or, terrified

And Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559> unto his brethren<WH251>, Come near<WH5066> to me, I pray you. And they came near<WH5066>. And he said<WH559>, I am Joseph<WH3130> your brother<WH251>, whom ye sold<WH4376> into Egypt<WH4714>.

Now therefore be not grieved<WH6087>, nor angry<WH2734> with yourselves<WH5869>, that ye sold<WH4376> me hither: for God<WH430> did send<WH7971> me before you<WH6440> to preserve life<WH4241>. nor: Heb. neither let there be anger in your eyes

For these two years<WH8141> hath the famine<WH7458> been in<WH7130> the land<WH776>: and yet there are five<WH2568> years<WH8141>, in the which there shall neither<WH369> be earing<WH2758> nor harvest<WH7105>.

And God<WH430> sent<WH7971> me before you<WH6440> to preserve<WH7760> you a posterity<WH7611> in the earth<WH776>, and to save your lives<WH2421> by a great<WH1419> deliverance<WH6413>. to preserve: Heb. to put for you a remnant

So now it was not you that sent<WH7971> me hither, but God<WH430>: and he hath made<WH7760> me a father<WH1> to Pharaoh<WH6547>, and lord<WH113> of all his house<WH1004>, and a ruler<WH4910> throughout all the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.

Haste<WH4116> ye, and go up<WH5927> to my father<WH1>, and say<WH559> unto him, Thus saith<WH559> thy son<WH1121> Joseph<WH3130>, God<WH430> hath made<WH7760> me lord<WH113> of all Egypt<WH4714>: come down<WH3381> unto me, tarry<WH5975> not:

And thou shalt dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Goshen<WH1657>, and thou shalt be near<WH7138> unto me, thou, and thy children<WH1121>, and thy children's<WH1121> children<WH1121>, and thy flocks<WH6629>, and thy herds<WH1241>, and all that thou hast:
And there will I nourish<WH3557> thee; for yet there are five<WH2568> years<WH8141> of famine<WH7458>; lest thou, and thy household<WH1004>, and all that thou hast, come to poverty<WH3423>.
And, behold, your eyes<WH5869> see<WH7200>, and the eyes<WH5869> of my brother<WH251> Benjamin<WH1144>, that it is my mouth<WH6310> that speaketh<WH1696> unto you.
And ye shall tell<WH5046> my father<WH1> of all my glory<WH3519> in Egypt<WH4714>, and of all that ye have seen<WH7200>; and ye shall haste<WH4116> and bring down<WH3381> my father<WH1> hither.
And he fell<WH5307> upon his brother<WH251> Benjamin's<WH1144> neck<WH6677>, and wept<WH1058>; and Benjamin<WH1144> wept<WH1058> upon his neck<WH6677>.
Moreover he kissed<WH5401> all his brethren<WH251>, and wept<WH1058> upon them: and after<WH310> that his brethren<WH251> talked<WH1696> with him.

And the fame<WH6963> thereof was heard<WH8085> in Pharaoh's<WH6547> house<WH1004>, saying<WH559>, Joseph's<WH3130> brethren<WH251> are come<WH935>: and it pleased<WH3190> <WH5869> Pharaoh<WH6547> well<WH3190> <WH5869>, and<WH5869> his servants<WH5650>. pleased: Heb. was good in the eyes of Pharaoh

And Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559> unto Joseph<WH3130>, Say<WH559> unto thy brethren<WH251>, This do<WH6213> ye; lade<WH2943> your beasts<WH1165>, and go<WH3212>, get<WH935> you unto the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>;

And take<WH3947> your father<WH1> and your households<WH1004>, and come<WH935> unto me: and I will give<WH5414> you the good<WH2898> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, and ye shall eat<WH398> the fat<WH2459> of the land<WH776>.

Now thou art commanded<WH6680>, this do<WH6213> ye; take<WH3947> you wagons<WH5699> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> for your little ones<WH2945>, and for your wives<WH802>, and bring<WH5375> your father<WH1>, and come<WH935>.
Also<WH5869> regard<WH2347> not your stuff<WH3627>; for the good<WH2898> of all the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> is yours. regard: Heb. let not your eye spare, etc.

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> so: and Joseph<WH3130> gave<WH5414> them wagons<WH5699>, according to the commandment<WH6310> of Pharaoh<WH6547>, and gave<WH5414> them provision<WH6720> for the way<WH1870>. commandment: Heb. mouth

To all of them he gave<WH5414> each man<WH376> changes<WH2487> of raiment<WH8071>; but to Benjamin<WH1144> he gave<WH5414> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> pieces of silver<WH3701>, and five<WH2568> changes<WH2487> of raiment<WH8071>.

And to his father<WH1> he sent<WH7971> after this<WH2063> manner; ten<WH6235> asses<WH860> laden<WH5375> with the good things<WH2898> of Egypt<WH4714>, and ten<WH6235> she asses<WH2543> laden<WH5375> with corn<WH1250> and bread<WH3899> and meat<WH4202> for his father<WH1> by the way<WH1870>. laden: Heb. carrying
So he sent<WH7971> his brethren<WH251> away<WH7971>, and they departed<WH3212>: and he said<WH559> unto them, See that ye fall not out<WH7264> by the way<WH1870>.
And they went up<WH5927> out of Egypt<WH4714>, and came<WH935> into the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667> unto Jacob<WH3290> their father<WH1>,

And told<WH5046> him, saying<WH559>, Joseph<WH3130> is yet alive<WH2416>, and he is governor<WH4910> over all the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>. And Jacob's heart<WH3820> fainted<WH6313>, for he believed<WH539> them not. Jacob's: Heb. his

And they told<WH1696> him all the words<WH1697> of Joseph<WH3130>, which he had said<WH1696> unto them: and when he saw<WH7200> the wagons<WH5699> which Joseph<WH3130> had sent<WH7971> to carry<WH5375> him, the spirit<WH7307> of Jacob<WH3290> their father<WH1> revived<WH2421>:
And Israel<WH3478> said<WH559>, It is enough<WH7227>; Joseph<WH3130> my son<WH1121> is yet alive<WH2416>: I will go<WH3212> and see him<WH7200> before I die<WH4191>.
